fields.question: Thanks for helping us improve our inspection service! Your feedback will be shared with County executives and any specific questions will be routed to the appropriate section director.

You recently had an **{{ itype }} ({{ description }})** inspection for Miami-Dade Permit #{{ permit_number }} with **{{ inspector }}** at **{{ addr }}**. According to our records, the inspection was marked **{{ result }}**. 

We'd like to ask some questions regarding your recent experience.
Which of the following most accurately describes your primary role in the inspection process?
Who was present during your most recent inspection?
How would you rate your experience with {{ inspector }}?
Would you like someone to follow-up with you in regards to your experience? If so, please enter a way we can contact you, either your e-mail or telephone number.
fields.description: You may also leave this blank if you don't want anyone to contact you regarding this survey.

fields.question: Any other questions or comments?
fields.description: Thanks again for reaching out! To see the real-time survey data, go to the following link:
